description: A fully searchable PDF of all the Approved Documents.

details.body:
The Independent Review of Building Regulations and Fire Safety led by Dame Judith Hackitt made a number of recommendations to enhance the safety of buildings, including to publish a fully searchable PDF of all Approved Documents.

Approved Documents

Download the fully searchable PDF of the Approved Documents

The Merged Approved Documents

PDF, 35.8 MB

This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology.

Request an accessible format.
If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email alternativeformats@communities.gov.uk. Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use.

Archived single Approved Documents

Find archived separate versions of all the Approved Documents.

Manual to the Building Regulations

View the Manual to the Building Regulations - a code of practice for use in England.

change_history.note: Added October 2024 edition of the Merged Approved Documents, incorporating 2024 editions of Approved Document G, Approved Document M, Volume 2 and Approved Document T.

Added March 2023 edition of the Merged Approved Documents, incorporating 2022 editions of Approved Document R1, Approved Document R2; 2022 amended editions of Approved Document B1,
Approved Document B2, Approved Document J; 2023 amended editions of Approved Document L1, Approved Document L2.

Added June 2022 edition of the Merged Approved Documents, incorporating 2021 editions of Approved Document F1, Approved Document F2, Approved Document L1, Approved Document L2, Approved Document O and Approved Document S.

Added July 2021 edition of the Merged Approved Documents, incorporating 2020 editions of Approved
Document B1 and Approved Document B2.
